description: Detects the image load of Python Core indicative of a Python script bundled with Py2Exe. Author: Patrick St. John, OTR (Open Threat Research). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Python Py2Exe Image Load
query: (winlog.event_data.Description:"Python\ Core" AND (NOT (process.executable:*Python* OR process.executable:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*))))
